INSERT INTO lol_questionnaire_result_detail (detail_uid, result_uid, question_uid, question_type, user_answer, score, created_at, created_by, updated_at) VALUES
(TNT_UUID_SHORT(), #{detail.resultUid}, #{detail.questionUid}, #{detail.questionType}, #{detail.userAnswer}, #{detail.score}, now(), #{detail.createdBy}, now())
